users.about:
data.bnf.fr gathers data from the different databases of the Biblioth√®que nationale de France, so as to create Web pages about Works, Authors, and ubjects together with a RDF view on the extracted data.

There are links to id.loc.gov for languages and nationalities, to dewey.info for subjects, and to DCMI type for types.

We use SKOS, FOAF, DC and RDA vocabularies, in a IFLA-LRM model.
users.name: data-bnf-fr

description: Group for datasets relevant to http://bibsoup.net/, especially those we may wish to import in bulk
title: BibSoup
name: bibsoup
